doc.field: Subseries C: Other artist's productions of Richard Foreman plays
Subseries C: Other artist's productions of Richard Foreman plays
Richard Foreman and Kate Manheim Papers
Richard Foreman and Kate Manheim Papers

No Strings Attached: A celebration of Richard Foreman, playwright. Festival staged a number of Foreman plays including "Angelface" directed by Richard Eoin Nash-Siedlecki, "Book of Splendors, Part I" directed by Michael John Garces, "Cafe Amerique" directed by Ian Hill, "Classical Therapy" directed by Jen Owens, "The Cure" directed by Tanya Kane-Parry, "Eddie goes to Poetry City" directed by Edward Einhorn, "Egyptology" directed by Ian W. Hill, "Film is Evil: Radio is Good" directed by Ian Hill, "Georges Bataille's Bathrobe" directed by Yelena Gluzman, "I've got the Shakes" directed by Susan Johnston, "The Mind King" directed by Emma Griffin, "Pain(t)" directed by Jamie Marcu, "Pandering to the Masses" directed by Jamie Marcu, "Penguin Touquet" directed by Daniel Kleinfeld, "Rhoda in Potatoland" directed by Aaron Beall, "Total Recall" directed by Margaret Cino, "Vertical Mobility" directed by Nancy Rogers. Programs.
